name: Rain of bullets
description:
In this exciting vector art style bullet hell game you, SHOOT RED BOI,SHOOT BLUE BOI, SHOOT RED LONG BOI, GET UPGRADES

CONTROLS : WASD or ARROW KEYS , left click to shoot

And don't complain it's a damn scratch game

WARNING: Game is still in BETA and you may encounter several issues

CREDIT: Toby Fox for all the music (from undertale OST )

                      Scratch for original sfx (i edited them)
developers: a random guy with no life
